title: The Glimmering Ruin
trigger_condition: Player enters an abandoned industrial zone at night
description: A faint, rhythmic humming draws your attention to a half-collapsed factory. Through a cracked window, you see a soft blue glow pulsating from machinery that somehow still has power. The air smells of ozone and rust.

choices.option: Investigate the source of the glow
choices.consequence: Find a functioning power core (+1 Energy Cell), but trigger a security system (-15 Health)

choices.option: Attempt to scavenge nearby debris quietly
choices.consequence: Find some usable scrap metal (+3 Scrap), but alert nearby feral dogs

choices.option: Mark the location and leave immediately
choices.consequence: No immediate rewards, but location is added to map for future exploration

choices.option: Set up an ambush for other scavengers
choices.consequence: Gain supplies from unaware travelers (+2 Food, +1 Medicine), but lose reputation with nearby factions
